name: Orb-it2
description:
Orb-it 2. is the sequel to the game i made using Processing.

In this game, you are a sphere and you are surrounded by enemies. This is a twin stick shooter

  • Use the Left analog to move and the Right one to aim,
  • Press R2 to shoot.
  • The max is 3 bullets per "clip" and you have to keep track of your bullet count.
  • Press Square when you can't shoot anymore to reload.
  • Pay attention to the game, the enemies can't wait to kill you.

If you have any comments, anything that you might find nice to have i the game, please leave a comment and i will be sure to put some thought into it.

UPCOMING UPDATES

  • Shield for player
  • Stage 2, with levels 1 to 9.
  • Bigger arena
  • Upgrade System.

Stay inside the ring or you will die.
